summary: An ordinance relating to the franchise granted to the Seattle and Montana Railroad Company, a corporation, its successors and assigns by Ordinance No. 18031 (as amended), granting the request of the Great Northern Railway Company, a corporation, the present owner of said franchise, for a change in the location of the franchise rights of way thereby specified; amending Section 2 of said Ordinance No. 18031 (as amended) with a view to such change; and providing for the acceptance by said Railroad Company of said franchise as so modified.
